projects.title: Go Noobs!
projects.subtitle: Riot Games
projects.description: League of Legends game-client landing page for new player. Fully animated menus and selection screens to get new players experience with the basics of the game and prime them for online play.

projects.title: Champion Reveals
projects.subtitle: Riot Games
projects.description: League of Legends microsites feature new Champion reveals and updates. These sites present useful info about the Champions in a stylistic and entertaining way. Usually consisting of abilities video switcher with menu, wallpaper downloads and in-game skin previews.

projects.title: Worlds 2017
projects.subtitle: Riot Games
projects.description: World Championship event in the League of Legends game client.This event took place globally for League of Legends and consumed localized data from multiple sources.

projects.title: Legendary Versus
projects.subtitle: Riot Games
projects.description: Legendary Versus event in the League of Legends game-client & microsite. This in-game event revolved around real world gameplay stats and also incorporated an in-browser comic book with time release content.

projects.title: TESPA
projects.subtitle: Blizzard Entertainnment / TESPA
projects.description: TESPA mobile app for recruiters to signup new chapter members while at events.

projects.title: Overwatch World Cup
projects.subtitle: Blizzard Entertainment
projects.description: Overwatch World Cup esports event hub.

projects.title: Heroes 2.0
projects.subtitle: Blizzard Entertainnment
projects.description: Modern redesign and relaunch of the Heroes of the Storm Game Site coinciding with a big in game update.

projects.title: National Concert Week
projects.subtitle: LiveNation
projects.description: LiveNation's largest promotional event of the year offering $20 concert tickets. This site pulls in data from a custom built API to tailor information to the users geolocation.

projects.title: LiveNation Sweeps
projects.subtitle: LiveNation
projects.description: LiveNation sweepstakes and contests. These projects require custom form-validation on the client side as well as server-side. Usually ships with custom built emails.

projects.title: Tickets Deals
projects.subtitle: LiveNation
projects.description: Promo landing page for special deals on event tickets.

projects.title: Hand in Hand
projects.subtitle: Scooter Braun
projects.description: Official benefit site for accepting hurricane relief donations.
